Name: Music Ball
About the game: The 'MusicBall' game, fun music arcade game with many levels. Thanks to carefully selected music and addictive gameplay, the developers managed to achieve an incredible experience for the players! ======================================================================== Features of 'MusicBall' ♫ The game is an arcade game where, while controlling the ball, you need to evade the blocks and play to the end of the level while the song is playing. ♫ The game features 3 worlds of 15 levels with their own unique visual style and gameplay. Each world has its own level boss. Can you get through them ...? ♫ 45 exciting unique songs! ========================================================================
